content.text: Hi! I'm a high school student, and I'm worried about my future. I'm not sure what I want to do with my life, and I'm afraid that I'm going to make the wrong decision.
Hi! It's okay to be worried about your future. I'm sure you'll figure it out eventually. What are you interested in?
I'm interested in a lot of things, but I'm not sure if I'm good enough at anything to make a career out of it. I like cosplay, but I'm not sure if I'm good enough to make a living doing it.
I think you should give it a try! You never know if you're good enough at something until you try it. And even if you're not good enough to make a living doing it, it can still be a fun hobby.
I'm also worried about moving to a new state. I'm moving to a new state with my dog, and I'm not sure if I'm going to miss my family and friends.
It's normal to be worried about moving to a new state. But it can also be a really exciting experience! You'll get to meet new people, see new places, and have new experiences.
I'm looking forward to starting a new life in a new state. I'm excited to meet new people and explore new places. I'm also a little bit nervous, but I know it's going to be a great experience.
I'm sure it will be! Good luck with everything!
